offer_app.api.permissions module

class offer_app.api.permissions.Authenticated

Bases: BasePermission

Custom permission to only allow authenticated users to access the API.

has_permission(request, view)

Check if the user is authenticated.

class offer_app.api.permissions.OwnerPatchAndDeleteOrIsAuthenticated

Bases: BasePermission

Custom permission to only allow the owner of an offer to update or delete it. All authenticated users can read offers.

has_object_permission(request, view, obj)

Check if the user is the owner of the offer or if they are authenticated.

class offer_app.api.permissions.SellerUserCreateOrReadOnly

Bases: BasePermission

Custom permission to only allow authenticated sellers to create offers. All users can read offers.

has_permission(request, view)

Check if the user is authenticated and has permission to create offers. Sellers are allowed to create offers, while all users can read offers.
